title: Ticket #7827: Update GSI credentials for GSI test
description:
The GSI test in our test suite fails on newer linux platforms. Digging into the error messages indicates that the keys in the credentials that we use in the test are too small. They are 1024 bits, and modern OpenSSL requires a minimum of 2048 bits. We need to create new credentials for the test.

Bonus points for automating generation of the credentials.
creator: jfrey
